document_data.name: Xualahuu
document_data.mainbody: '''Xualahuu''' was a [[beholder]] that lived in the [[Zhentarim]]-controlled oasis of [[Olomaa]] in the [[Anauroch]] desert.
document_data.Relationships: Xualahuu was deeply loyal to [[Manshoon]] and tried to profit off all occasions to advance the Black Network's plots.
document_data.History: By [[1358 DR]], it had been seriously injured by some [[Harpers]] and lost the use of some of its eyestalks. Xualahuu retreated to [[Olomaa]] in order to regather strength.
